mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PLACE (PLACE_ID, PLACE_NAME, PLACE_CATEGORY, PLACE_CONTEXT, PLACE_ADDRESS, PLACE_INFO, PLACE_WARNING, PLACE_MONEY_TIME, MEMBER_EMAIL, PLACE_CREATE_DATE, IMAGE_ID, IMAGE_PATH, IMAGE_REAL_NAME, IMAGE_CHG_NAME, IMAGE_EXTENSION) VALUES (PLACE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{placeName}, #{placeCategory}, #{placeContext}, #{placeAddress}, #{placeWarning}, #{placeInfo}, #{placeMoneyTime}, #{memberEmail}, SYSDATE, IMAGE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{imagePath}, #{imageRealName}, #{imageChgName}, #{imageExtension})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM PLACE ORDER BY PLACE_ID ASC
SELECT * FROM PLACE WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL = #{memberEmail} ORDER BY PLACE_ID ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE PLACE SET PLACE_NAME = #{placeName}, PLACE_CATEGORY = #{placeCategory}, PLACE_CONTEXT = #{placeContext}, PLACE_ADDRESS = #{placeAddress}, PLACE_WARNING = #{placeWarning}, PLACE_INFO = #{placeInfo}, PLACE_MONEY_TIME = #{placeMoneyTime}, IMAGE_PATH = #{imagePath}, IMAGE_REAL_NAME = #{imageRealName}, IMAGE_CHG_NAME = #{imageChgName}, IMAGE_EXTENSION = #{imageExtension} WHERE PLACE_ID = #{placeId}
